short_summary: Termination of Service for supplier which has been agreed for inspection and maintenance of generator sets at the National Science Institute
description: Request for Proposal for the acquisition of Inspection and maintenance of generator sets at IML (Institut Maurice-Lamontage) at Mont-Joli, Quebec
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Inspection and Maintenance of Generator Sets Services

**Request for Proposal (RFP)**

**Reference Number**: WS4104795120-Doc4241898469

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)

**Description**: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites bidders to participate in a competitive Request for Proposal (RFP) for the Inspection and Maintenance of Generator Sets services at the Institut Maurice-Lamontage (IML) in Mont-Joli, Quebec.

**Key Details**

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: This tender falls under the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Mont-Joli
* **Ending Date**: 2025-09-30
* **Notice Information**:
	+ Contact Name: Pichette, Veronique Hae Ok (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: veroniquehaeok.pichette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ Phone Number: None
	+ Fax Number: None
	+ Address: None
* **Notice URL**: None
* **Attachments**: None

**Closing Information**

* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-10-04 14:00:00 (Local time)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
